Channel_Messaging_APIUsing_channel_messa.summary: The Channel Messaging API allows two separate scripts running in different browsing contexts attached to the same document (e.g., two {{HTMLElement("iframe")}} elements, the main document and a single {{HTMLElement("iframe")}}, or two documents via a ) to communicate directly, passing messages between each other through two-way channels (or pipes) with a port at each end.

remarks.para: In this article we'll explore the basics of using this technology.
